channel.title: Random DCS
channel.description:
Constantly, my players are getting disconected for no reason.
What i see in my console is that there client is connecting them again and so it causes a null, it looks like this :
[code]connection from [b]IP[/b] [client-3-Vox]: Loading Process COmpleted [Has powersm lag: 2ms] ClientHandler: client Vox disconnected <IP> game saved for player Vox ClientHandler: Client vox disconnencted <ip>[/code]
and this happens when they are already logged in.
source is delta im pretty sure its a server.java problem, but i dont know wha.
Sometimes it even nulls there client so it contantly rejects there ip.

item.title: Random DCS
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

no players :s , doesnt let me connect , it says it connects on cmd and thn kicks

Read full topic

item.title: Random DCS
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

how many players are on your server when this happens delta is pretty bad put togather. so the server might not be able to handle your amount of players. just a guess.

Read full topic
